title: Junior road safety: only one way
creator_credit: Grahame Jennings and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Encourages the correct use of seat belts, and highlights the dangers of playing games on the road and crossing the road between parked cars. Designed for children from 7 to 11 years.
